::: {.justify}


PhD candidate in the Postgraduate Program in Social Sciences at UFMA (PPGCSoc/UFMA). Master's degree in Social Sciences from PUC-São Paulo. Sociologist and member of the Work and Society Study and Research Group (GEPTS/UFMA). Researches new forms of work organization, precarious employment, and workers in digital applications. Has researched the labor movement in Brazil and teacher unionism in Maranhão.


:::
